page.title: 09EDUCATION (Continued)
page.content: {ANNUAL EVENTS Every year our school enters the "Britain in bloom" competition. This year you had to paint a poster,with the theme of either January,April, July or August.We have flower beds with trees,shrubs and flowers.There are also flowers in hanging baskets and window boxes.Children also bring in miniature gardens.The school looks very colourful and we have won the competition sevral times. {OTHER PEOPLE IN SCHOOL Other people who work in the school are the caretaker and cleaners.They come in after school to clean the rooms,corridors,tables and bins.the caretaker has the keys to the school.It is his job to fix the lights and things like that.He also carries the milk in.Dinnner ladies come in every lunch timeand supervise meals.
